title: Land For Sale - Colombo 2
details:
01. Prime Minister’s Residence (Temple Trees) – 300 meters
02. Financial Hub of Sri Lanka – 250 meters
03. Nawaloka Hospital – (a reputed private hospital) – 200 meters
04. Altair Luxury Apartments and Condominiums (which will have a boulevard changing the present set up of a roadway in front which would enhance Navam Mawatha, the road to our property) – 200 meters.
05. Private school, Bishop’s college – 650 meters
06. Cinnamon Grand 5 star hotel – 450 meters
